actions.text: Amendment SA 605 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 605 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 169.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 605.
Amendment SA 605 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S6431) To provide a partially refundable tax credit for caregiving related expenses.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 605 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 169.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 605 proposed by Senator Mikulski.

purpose: To provide a partially refundable tax credit for caregiving related expenses.
